casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. DEMATTEO
v.
STATE TEACHERS RETIREMENT SYS. 2018-1531 Supreme Court of Ohio. January 14, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On joint motion to remand. Motion granted. Cause remanded to the court of appeals to rule on the pending joint motion to vacate. The briefing schedule remains stayed, and the parties shall notify the court within ten days of the court of appeals' ruling on the joint motion to vacate.
